hotels.description: Located in the heart of Lisbon's Chiado district, Hotel Borges Chiado offers comfortable rooms and a convenient location for exploring the city. It's within walking distance of many attractions, restaurants, and shops.
hotels.name: Hotel Borges Chiado

hotels.address: Rossio Train Station, 2nd Floor, Largo do Duque de Cadaval, 1, 1200-160 Lisboa, Portugal
hotels.description: Lisbon Destination Hostel is situated in a historic building in the city center. It offers a social atmosphere, dorms and private rooms, and organized activities for guests.
hotels.name: Lisbon Destination Hostel

hotels.description: Located in a former Swiss embassy, The Independente offers a mix of dorms and private suites with unique design. Features a rooftop bar and a restaurant.
hotels.name: The Independente Hostel & Suites

hotels.address: Pra√ßa Dom Pedro IV 59, 1100-200 Lisboa, Portugal
hotels.description: My Story Hotel Rossio is located in the heart of Lisbon, close to Rossio Square. It offers comfortable and modern rooms with a focus on local stories and culture.
hotels.name: My Story Hotel Rossio
